title: Awesome Staff - Great Hotel
text:
Wonderful hotel and what makes it extra special is the staff from the doormen to the front desk they are all very friendly and professional.
Booked this hotel through Hotel Tonight and we arrived early 11 am (checkin is at 3) so left our bags and asked us to come back in a few hours. Got back at 2 and asked if we wanted to upgrade to a Junior Suite for a very minimal price and let me say if it's available DO IT - the room as HUGE - well tremendous by NYC standards - and extremely clean. The staff took the time to ask about what we were in NYC for and the next day checking out remembered (even though the hotel was fully booked) to ask how our concert was and who we were seeing.
I would definitely return again and highly suggest this boutique hotel- you won't be disappointed
